conditions.name: Post-Treatment Follow-up
conditions.text: Subjects who complete up to 6 treatment cycles or who discontinue treatment prior to reaching an event of disease progression are to continue visits and radiographic assessments until progression.

criterion.event: treatment completion or early discontinuation without progression

provenance.text_snippet: Subjects who complete up to 6 treatment cycles or who discontinue treatment prior to reaching an event of disease progression are to continue visits and radiographic assessments until progression.
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_EVENT, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote defines a specific sub-population based on clinical events (treatment completion/discontinuation) who must undergo continued assessments.

conditions.name: Positive Pregnancy Test
conditions.text: A positive urine pregnancy test will be confirmed with a serum pregnancy test.

provenance.text_snippet: Serum pregnancy test will be done at Screening. Urine pregnancy test will be done prior to dosing at C1D-2 unless the serum pregnancy test was collected within 7 days of C1D-2. Local urine pregnancy t
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_RESULT, pattern expected TEMPORAL_PRIOR
provenance.rationale: The footnote explicitly states that a serum pregnancy test is triggered by a positive urine pregnancy test result. It also contains a TEMPORAL_PRIOR condition ('unless the serum pregnancy test was collected within 7 days') and a VISIT_OPTIONAL condition ('may also be repeated per the discretion of the Investigator').

conditions.name: Suspected Brain Metastases
conditions.text: Baseline MRI of the brain only for subjects with suspected metastases due to neurologic signs or symptoms.

provenance.text_snippet: Baseline MRI of the brain only for subjects with suspected metastases due to neurologic signs or symptoms. A CT scan may be performed if an MRI is contraindicated.
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_INDICATION, pattern expected VISIT_OPTIONAL
provenance.rationale: The footnote explicitly limits the MRI assessment to a subset of subjects based on clinical signs and symptoms, which is a clinical indication.

conditions.name: Study Discontinuation
conditions.text: When an Investigator has determined that a subject should discontinue the study

provenance.text_snippet: When an Investigator has determined that a subject should discontinue the study, a Final Visit will be conducted.
provenance.rationale: The footnote describes a specific event (an investigator's decision to discontinue a subject) that triggers the Final Visit. This visit only applies to subjects under this specific circumstance.

conditions.name: Final Visit Timing
conditions.text: if the Final Visit is < 30 days from the last administration of drug

provenance.text_snippet: A Follow-Up visit is required if the Final Visit is < 30 days from the last administration of drug.
provenance.rationale: The requirement for a Follow-Up visit is explicitly conditional on the timing of a prior event (the Final Visit relative to the last drug dose). The 'if' clause makes this a clear condition.

conditions.name: Subjects in Maintenance Therapy
conditions.text: For those subjects in maintenance therapy

provenance.text_snippet: Following completion of platinum doublet therapy, maintenance pemetrexed 500 mg q3 weeks is strongly encouraged for all subjects who are suitable candidates. For those subjects in maintenance therapy,
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_EVENT, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote specifies a particular tumor assessment schedule that applies only to the subset of subjects who are receiving maintenance therapy. This limits the applicability of this specific schedule to a sub-population defined by a clinical event.

conditions.name: Discontinuation without recent scan
conditions.text: An unscheduled tumor assessment should be performed if the subject discontinues from the study for a reason other than radiographic progression, and no scan has been performed within the last 4 weeks.

criterion.event: discontinuation for reason other than progression

provenance.text_snippet: An unscheduled tumor assessment should be performed if the subject discontinues from the study for a reason other than radiographic progression, and no scan has been performed within the last 4 weeks.
validation_flags: LLM returned VISIT_TRIGGERED, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote describes a clear set of criteria (a clinical event and a temporal condition) that trigger an unscheduled assessment.

conditions.name: Post-Veliparib Dosing Confirmation
conditions.text: Carboplatin and paclitaxel are to be given only after veliparib dosing on cycle Day -2 and Day -1 are confirmed.

provenance.text_snippet: Carboplatin and paclitaxel are to be given only after veliparib dosing on cycle Day -2 and Day -1 are confirmed.
provenance.rationale: The footnote establishes a strict sequence, making the administration of certain drugs conditional on the confirmed completion of a prior dosing event.

conditions.name: Randomization Timing
conditions.text: Screening ECOG may be used to stratify during a randomization call if randomization is performed prior to C1D-2.

provenance.text_snippet: Screening ECOG may be used to stratify during a randomization call if randomization is performed prior to C1D-2.
provenance.rationale: The footnote describes a condition (the timing of randomization relative to a visit) that affects how a subsequent procedure (stratification) is performed using assessment data.

provenance.text_snippet: All systemic post treatment anti-cancer therapy, if applicable and available, will be collected in the survival follow-up period.
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_INDICATION, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote states that data collection will occur 'if applicable and available,' making the activity conditional on the subject's clinical circumstances (i.e., whether they are receiving post-treatment anti-cancer therapy and if that information is accessible).

_agentDefinition.purpose: Applies population-specific and clinical conditions from SOA footnotes to activities (e.g., 'females only', 'if clinically indicated'), enabling conditional scheduling.
_agentDefinition.extractionMethodology: Footnote marker detection and text extraction. LLM classification of condition types (population, clinical, timing). Rule structure generation with applicable activity linkage. Provenance tracking to source footnote.

keyOutputs.description: How this affects EDC form logic

downstreamIntegrations.useCase: Dynamic form visibility and edit checks
downstreamIntegrations.automationExample: Pregnancy test form shows only when SEX='F' AND AGE>=childbearing age
IRT schedules MRI only for subjects with brain metastases at baseline
Population conditions feed eligibility check automation
Additional ECG triggered when QTc > threshold per footnote rule

automationInsights.description: Conditions translate directly to EDC conditional logic
Population conditions enable subject-specific visit schedules
Automated condition checking prevents missed assessments
